about_the_game:
You play as Norra, a quite young woman in her mid-twenties. Help her by collecting her poems in a beautiful, colorful open world. The poems are the messages of her past and they will give clues of where to go next and what really happened to Norra.
Norra has an imaginary friend, Riggy. Riggy has been part of Norra’s life since she was a toddler. He never left. Riggy plays a big role in Norra’s life and often get in the way of basic life decisions. Norra has this constant fight between herself and Riggy where he became the negativity of her personality and Norra herself the positivity in her life. With this fight going on, Norra can’t sometimes distinguish between fiction and reality.



Like most children, Norra has an incredible imagination. With this marvelous imagination, she has built a fantastical world where she and her ever-loyal sidekick, Riggy, escape to. With the help of Riggy, Norra uses this imaginary world as a mirror of reality in which she can safely explore her thoughts and feelings about real-life situations. Unlike most children, however, Norra’s fantasy world and imaginary friend doesn’t stay behind in her childhood. Unable to face the horrid reality of her father’s untimely death, Norra retreats to her imaginary world and into the company of her ever-empathetic friend, Riggy. Trapped inside the confines of her imagination, Norra is unable to make friends and becomes estranged from her mother, who tries to fight her own battles at the bottom of a whiskey glass. Intoxicated by Riggy’s whispers coaxing her to retreat into her mind palace, Norra overlooks valuable relationships, including a potential love interest, Alice, Norra’s classmate and only friend in the real world. Norra’s imaginary world expands and Riggy’s voice amplifies until both drown out the cruel reality, protecting Norra from all that could harm her. Isolating her from everyone, until loneliness is the only friend she knows.



The characters in this game all have one purpose, and that is to create an emotional connection with Norra. The positive aspect of it and the negative aspect. All the characters are NPCs in the game and the player can interact with them in certain story points. The player communicates with the dialog trees that are presented to him/her.



The gameplay is simple but effective. Think of this game as a “life simulator” without the surviving part. Control Norra with the standard controls of a walking simulator.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) o 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 760 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) o 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 a 3,4 GHz / AMD FX-8350 a 4,0 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD R9 390X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A friend called Loneliness is a third-person exploration game based on the song from The Beatles, Eleanor Rigby. Uncover the truth of our main character Norra, as she will leave you clues through her poems that she has written.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
